programme.title: Nancy Reagan's biography
programme.short_synopsis: Is an unauthorised biography of ex-president's wife, Mrs Reagan, just salacious gossip?
programme.medium_synopsis: An unauthorised biography of ex-pesident's wife, Mrs Reagan makes Alistair Cooke question how gossip becomes news, whilst President Bush struggles to defend his Gulf War.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
